page.description: Use HTTP GET or POST to retrieve the specified URL.
page.prototype: Result as C = http_fetch_page2(method as C, url as C [,body as B [,include_headers as L [,timeout as N]]])

argument.name: method
argument.description: The method to use. Can be one of the following:

argument.name: include_headers
argument.description: Default = .f.. Whether or not to include headers in the returned response.

argument.name: timeout
argument.description: Default = 45000 (45 seconds). Timeout in milliseconds. If *[xb:timeout]* is set to -1 or 0, HTTP_FETCH_PAGE2() will use the default timeout of 45000.

return.name: Result
return.description: The response returned from the URL.

page.discussion: The HTTP_FETCH_PAGE2() function uses Microsoft.XMLHTTP which creates an [IXMLHTTPRequest object] to retrieve a URL.
